# Splunk Commands Reference

A comprehensive reference guide for Splunk SPL (Search Processing Language) commands.

## Features

- 50+ Splunk commands with detailed documentation
- Interactive web application with search and filtering
- Organized by command categories
- Practical examples and formulas
- Premium dark-themed UI

## Quick Start

1. Clone this repository
2. Open `index.html` in your browser
3. Browse commands or use the search feature

## Documentation

See [README.md](README.md) for complete command reference tables.

## Categories

- Search Commands
- Statistical Commands
- Reporting Commands
- Transforming Commands
- Field Extraction Commands
- Time-Based Commands
